alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Franklin and southwestern Lawrence Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Russellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Newburg, Mt Hope, Isbell, Rockwood, Landersville and western Bankhead National Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northwestern Alabama.
